import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./LoginSignup.css" import user_icon from "../../Assets/user.png" import email_icon from "../../Assets/email.png" import password_icon from "../../Assets/password.png" import phone_icon from "../../Assets/smartphone-call.png" function LoginSignup() { const [action,setAction]= useState("Sign Up") return (
{action}
Lost Password ? Click Here !
Sign - Up
Login
) } export default LoginSignup
